solution_line_template: It takes {people_per_car} x {multiplier_for_truck} = <<{people_per_car}*{multiplier_for_truck}={people_per_truck}>>{people_per_truck} people to lift a truck.
{people_per_car} x {num_cars} = <<{people_per_car}*{num_cars}={people_for_cars}>>{people_for_cars} people are needed to lift the cars.
{people_per_truck} x {num_trucks} = <<{people_per_truck}*{num_trucks}={people_for_trucks}>>{people_for_trucks} people are needed to lift the trucks.
